author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a bug introduced in #39770, where the input EDM file used to test the HLT HIon menu with Run-3 data was unintentionally changed. The issue was spotted by @Martin-Grunewald .

This fix is needed for the HLT-Validation tests that run in IBs. It will be backported as part of #39772 and #39773.

PRs tests are not sensitive to this change.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: fix Run-3 data input for tests on HIon HLT menu
